an4.137:4.1: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.
an4.137:4.3: One person doesn’t value or submit to ethics, samādhi, or wisdom.
an4.137:5.1: One person values and submits to ethics, but not to samādhi or wisdom.
an4.137:6.1: One person values and submits to ethics and samādhi, but not wisdom.
an4.137:7.1: One person values and submits to ethics, samādhi, and wisdom.
an4.137:7.2: These are the four people found in the world.”
